보드 비공개 안내메시지: Only invited members can access a private board.
보드 공개 안내메시지: Anyone can see a public board and leave comment on it.
보드 삭제 타이틀: Are you sure to delete the board?
보드 삭제 확인 메시지: Once the board is deleted, cards in it will be deleted, too and you cannot recover them.
칼럼 삭제 타이틀: Are you sure to delete the column?
칼럼 삭제 확인 메시지: Once the column is deleted cards in it are also deleted and they cannot be recovered.
카드 삭제 타이틀: Are you sure to delete the card?
카드 삭제 확인 메시지: Once the card is deleted it cannot be recovered.
체크리스트 삭제 타이틀: Are you sure to delete the checklist?
체크리스트 삭제 확인 메시지: You cannot recover it once it is deleted.
보드나가기 타이틀: Would you like to leave from this board?
보드나가기 확인 메시지: Once you click [Leave], you'll be no longer a board member.
이 멤버를 보드에서 제외: Exclude this member from this board
이 멤버를 카드에서 제외: Exclude this member from this card
댓글 삭제 타이틀: Are you sure to delete the comment?
댓글 삭제 확인 메시지: You cannot recover it once it is deleted.
파일 삭제 타이틀: Are you sure to delete it?
파일 삭제 확인 메시지: You cannot recover it once it is deleted.
보드 멤버 삭제 타이틀: Would you like to exclude this member?
보드 멤버 삭제 확인 메시지: You can invite him/her again later.
운영자 변경 타이틀: Would you like to change the administrator?
운영자 변경 확인 메시지: If you give a admin permission, you will be a member.
카드 상세내용 삭제 확인 타이틀: Are you sure to delete the description?
카드 상세내용 삭제 확인 메시지: You cannot recover it once it is deleted.
